introduction: This video discusses the concept of responsible quantum computing and the principles that guide the development and deployment of quantum technologies. It highlights the importance of collaboration, awareness, and the development of policies to manage cryptography in the enterprise. The video also introduces the IBM Quantum Safe Explorer tool and the Fund Portfolio Analysis program, which help identify and analyze cryptography usage in the network. The video concludes by emphasizing the need for a foothold in the quantum safe technology space and the partnerships that can make an impact.

sections.title: Section 1: Introduction to Responsible Quantum Computing
content: Explanation of responsible quantum computing and its importance in the development and deployment of quantum technologies.
Introduction of the five principles that guide responsible quantum computing.
Discussion on the role of collaboration and awareness in responsible quantum computing.
Overview of the IBM Quantum Safe Explorer tool and its capabilities.

sections.title: Section 2: Discovering and Analyzing Cryptography Usage
content: Explanation of the Fund Portfolio Analysis program and its capabilities.
Discussion on the importance of observing dynamic cryptography exchange.
Presentation of statistics on the discovery of artifacts using the program.
Overview of the languages supported by the program.

sections.title: Section 3: Addressing Hot Areas with Policies
content: Explanation of the role of policies in addressing hot areas in the enterprise.
Discussion on the adoption of policies and their impact on the network infrastructure and applications.
Overview of the potential risks associated with IoT devices and their security profile.
Emphasis on the need for involvement from a lot of people across the enterprise.

sections.title: Section 4: Awareness and Supply Chain Security
content: Discussion on the importance of awareness in the enterprise and its impact on security posture.
Overview of the need to start having conversations with suppliers regarding their quantum roadmap.
Emphasis on the role of supply chain security in the overall security profile.
Call to action for increased awareness and supply chain security.

sections.title: Section 5: Partnerships and Impact in the Quantum Safe Technology Space
content: Overview of the partnerships that can make an impact in the quantum safe technology space.
Discussion on the role of IBM and other companies in the quantum safe technology ecosystem.
Emphasis on the need for a foothold in the quantum safe technology space.
Call to action for continued partnerships and impact in the quantum safe technology space.
topics: IBM's Role in Quantum Safe Technology
